name: Storage logging is enabled for Blob service for read, write, and delete requests
query: { blobContainers( where: { storageAccount: { OR: [ { isBlobServicesDiagnosticsSettingsEnabled: false } { blobServicesDiagnosticSettings_NONE: { AND: [ { logs_SINGLE: { enabled: true, category: "StorageRead" } } { logs_SINGLE: { enabled: true, category: "StorageWrite" } } { logs_SINGLE: { enabled: true, category: "StorageDelete" } } ] } } ] } } ) {...AssetFragment} }
